subject: Self Care
title: Growing Your EQ for Life
description: A 60-second lesson on Growing Your EQ for Life.

hook.text: EQ isn't a fixed trait you're born with. It's a practice you develop daily, like fitness for the mind and heart.

buildup.text: Neuroplasticity means the brain rewires with practice. Emotional skills strengthen every time you use them.

discovery.text: Three daily practices build EQ: label one emotion, listen without replying once, and pause before one reaction.

twist.text: You don't need a course or a coach. Real EQ grows in everyday moments: conflicts, conversations, and quiet reflection.

climax.text: Start today. One emotion labeled, one pause taken, one person truly heard. That's an entire EQ workout.

punchline.text: EQ is a daily practice. Start small. Grow for life.

quiz.question: What three daily practices build emotional intelligence?
options: Label an emotion, listen without replying, pause before reacting
Meditate for an hour, journal for an hour, exercise for an hour
